title: O que é Lignina?
description: Aqui descrevo o que é a Lignina e sua importância no cenário atual.

Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

title: Welcome to The Journey of a Scientist
description:
Welcome to our new blog, The Journey of a Scientist. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
